title: Base Schema for All Kek Docs

id.description: A 12 byte (20 char) global unique identifier consisting of 4 bytes representing seconds since Unix epoch, 3 byte machine identifier, 2 byte process id, and 3 byte counter starting with a random value. Go Reference sample: https://github.com/rs/xid

current.title: KekDoc Current Content
current.description: Non-required field to be used as helper to display the most current doc property data without having to use a build function. Generally better to store this information in an outside database.

items.title: Kekrevision Block
items.description: A single revision block in the kek document chain.

space.description: The unique kekspace string which is making this revision.

signature.title: Signed verification
signature.description: A 3rd party verification signature that can assure the authenticity of this revision.

source.description: The uri to the 3rd party source that has written the signature.

token.description: The unique token string that verifies this block.

hash.description: A  256 sha hash that consists of the index + space + previous_hash + data + autoincrementing nonce value. MUST start with 2 leading zeroes

index.description: The current index of the block in the chain

timestamp.description: The unix timestamp when the revision block was added.

add.title: Add property values
add.description: The properties and their associated values to add to the doc.

modify.title: Modify property values
modify.description: The properties and their associated values to modify in the doc.

delete.title: Delete property values
delete.description: A key / bool hash map for properties to delete. Ex: '{"my": {"item" : {"property": true}}}'
